Ingredients.6: 1 (10 ounce) can CAMPBELL'S® Condensed Cream of Chicken Soup

Directions.1: Season the chicken as desired. Melt the butter in a large deep non-stick skillet over medium-high heat. Add the chicken and cook, breaking up with a spoon, 8 minutes or until no longer pink.

Directions.2: Add the onion, mushrooms, and garlic. Saute 3 minutes or until slightly softened.

Directions.3: Stir in the soup, water, milk, lemon juice, and Worcestershire sauce; heat to a boil. Stir in the noodles. Reduce the heat to medium. Boil gently, uncovered, stirring often, 8 minutes.

Directions.4: Add peas. Cook, stirring often, 3 to 5 minutes or until noodles have reached desired tenderness.
